scripts.dev: run-pty % yarn dev:node % yarn dev:client % yarn dev:contracts
scripts.link:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do yarn link @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done
scripts.unlink:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do yarn unlink @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done && yarn install --force
